import styleSCard from './SmallCard.module.css' import ImgTotti from '../img/totti.png' import iconTeam from '../img/squadre.png' import iconCamp from '../img/campionati.png' import { useLoaderData } from 'react-router-dom'; const SmallCard = () => { const data = useLoaderData() const drinks = data.drinks return(
{ drinks.map( drink =>
Francesco

TOTTI

As Roma
Serie A
)}
)}; export default SmallCard;
